sprint_id,

mapper.update:
update scrum_sprint
team_name = #{teamName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sprint_name = #{sprintName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
send_emails = #{sendEmails,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
auto_send_email = #{autoSendEmail,jdbcType=CHAR},
plan_cycle = #{planCycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
real_cycle = #{realCycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where sprint_id = #{sprintId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update scrum_sprint set team_name = #{teamName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sprint_name = #{sprintName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_emails = #{sendEmails,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auto_send_email = #{autoSendEmail,jdbcType=CHAR}, plan_cycle = #{planCycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, real_cycle = #{realCycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where sprint_id = #{sprintId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
